title: Teacher Capacity-Building Program for Computational Thinking and Technology Integration in Multicultural Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Core Concepts in Educational Pedagogy
context.additional_context: Prioritizes technology-integrated education reflecting cultural diversity and social justice, referencing educational environments in Southwestern U.S. universities with high Hispanic learner populations.

learning_goals: Prospective teachers can design educational activities that solve real-world problems in K-12 settings by applying computational thinking stages
Learners can implement inclusive educational strategies in technology-integrated classes with students from diverse cultural backgrounds
They can develop project-based assessment plans using educational technology tools and iteratively improve them through peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
